verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Had Finished <S%G5055><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Commanding <S%G1299><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> He Departed <S%G3327><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Preach <S%G2784><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> Their Cities. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison <S%G1201><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%>
Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4771><s%> Art Thou <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming One, <S%G2064><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Are We To Look For? <S%G4328><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Relate <S%G518><s%> To John <S%G2491><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Hear <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See : <S%G991><s%>

Blind <S%G5185><s%> Receive Sight, <S%G308><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> Walk; <S%G4043><s%> Lepers <S%G3015><s%> Are Cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Deaf <S%G2974><s%> Hear; <S%G191><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Are Raised, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> Are Evangelized. <S%G2097><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Whoever <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Be Offended <S%G4624><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me. <S%G1698><s%>

<S%G5130><s%> But As These <S%G1161><s%> Were Going <S%G4198><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Went Ye Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> To Look At? <S%G2300><s%> A Reed <S%G2563><s%> By The <S%G5259><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> Shaken? <S%G4531><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Went Ye Out <S%G1831><s%> To See? <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Soft <S%G3120><s%> Garments <S%G2440><s%> Arrayed? <S%G294><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soft Garments <S%G3120><s%> Wear <S%G5409><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Houses <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Kings <S%G935><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Went Ye Out <S%G1831><s%> To See? <S%G1492><s%> A Prophet? <S%G4396><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And One <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4053><s%> Than A Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is He <S%G2076><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%>, It Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Send 649 V-PAI-1S 3588 T-ASM 32 N-ASM My Messenger 3450 P-1GS Before 4253 PREP 4383 N-GSN Thy Face, 4675 P-2GS Who 3739 R-NSM Shall Prepare 2680 V-FAI-3S 3588 T-ASF 3598 N-ASF Thy Way 4675 P-2GS Before 1715 PREP Thee. 4675 P-2GS

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%>, To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Has Not Risen <S%G1453><s%> Among Those <S%G1722><s%> Born <S%G1084><s%> Of Women <S%G1135><s%> A Greater <S%G3187><s%> Than John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist. <S%G910><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That Is <S%G1161><s%> Less <S%G3398><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Than He <S%G846><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G575><s%> But From <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Baptist <S%G910><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Now, <S%G737><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Is Taken By Violence, <S%G971><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Violent <S%G973><s%> Seize <S%G726><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G3956><s%> For All <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Prophesied. <S%G4395><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Are Willing <S%G2309><s%>, To Receive It, <S%G1209><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Come. <S%G2064><s%>
He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%>, To Hear, <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> But To What <S%G1161><s%> Shall I Liken <S%G3666><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> This Generation? <S%G3778><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> <S%G3664><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> To Little Children <S%G3808><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Markets <S%G58><s%> Sitting, <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Calling <S%G4377><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2083><s%>, To Their Companions, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> We Piped <S%G832><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Dance; <S%G3738><s%> We Mourned <S%G2354><s%>, To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Wail. <S%G2875><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> For Came <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Drinking, <S%G4095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Say, <S%G3004><s%> A Demon <S%G1140><s%> He Has. <S%G2192><s%>

Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drinking, <S%G4095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Say, <S%G3004><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> A Glutton <S%G5314><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Wine Bibber, <S%G3630><s%> Of Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> A Friend <S%G5384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Sinners. <S%G268><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> By <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Reproach <S%G3679><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Had Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most <S%G4118><s%> <S%G1411><s%> Of His Works Of Power, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Repented Not. <S%G3340><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%>, Chorazin! <S%G5523><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Bethsaida! <S%G966><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%> Had Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works Of Power <S%G1411><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Have Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3819><s%> Long Ago <S%G302><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ashes <S%G4700><s%> They Had Repented. <S%G3340><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> For Tyre <S%G5184><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%> More Tolerable <S%G414><s%> Shall It Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment <S%G2920><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> For You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thou, <S%G4771><s%>, Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%>, Hast Been Lifted Up, <S%G5312><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> Shalt Be Brought Down : <S%G2601><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> Had Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works Of Power <S%G1411><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Have Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee, <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3306><s%> It Had Remained <S%G302><s%> Until <S%G3360><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Today. <S%G4594><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> For The Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> More Tolerable <S%G414><s%> Shall It Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment <S%G2920><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> For Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

At <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Praise <S%G1843><s%> Thee, <S%G4671><s%> O Father, <S%G3962><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Didst Hide <S%G613><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Wise <S%G4680><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prudent, <S%G4908><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Didst Reveal <S%G601><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Babes. <S%G3516><s%>
Yea, <S%G3483><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Father, <S%G3962><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> It Was <S%G1096><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2107><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Thee. <S%G4675><s%>

All Things <S%G3956><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Were Delivered <S%G3860><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father. <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Knows <S%G1921><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Father; <S%G3962><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> Does Know <S%G1921><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> He To Whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> May Will <S%G1014><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> To Reveal Him. <S%G601><s%>

Come <S%G1205><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Ye That <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2872><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are Burdened, <S%G5412><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Will Give Rest 373 V-FAI-1S You. 5209 P-2AP
